long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Designing a more usable open-source chat room, starting with YouTube's chat room.

Help us improve chat functionality. Feedback is appreciated! Please mail your comments to dshumw2@uic.edu.

We found two YouTube chat CPU bugs, which this extension provides a temporary fix for:
 		1) Runs at 100%+ CPU when many chatters.
 		2) Runs at 100%+ CPU after posting a message and "slow mode" is on in the chat. There is some sort of timer event which forces CPU usage to rise sharply.

These bugs are fixed as follows:
 		Bug 1) The HTML div element containing the chat messages is hidden using CSS ("display:none;").
 		Bug 2) The "Send" button with circular timer is removed from the page on page load.
